sourcesContent:
import {INCREMENT} from "../actions/types"

const initialState = {
    driver: [{
        name: "Standard Kart",
        type: "kart",
        img: "StandardKartBodyMK8.png",
        wg: 2,
        ac: 4,
        on: 3,
        of: 3,
        mt: 4,
        sl: 3,
        sw: 3,
        sa: 3,
        sg: 3,
        tl: 3,
        tw: 2,
        ta: 3,
        tg: 3
    },],
    kart: [],
    tire: [],
    glider: [],
    combo: []
}

const sampleReducer = (state=initialState, action) => {
    switch(action.type){
        case INCREMENT:
            return {
                ...state,
                count: state.count + action.data    // referencing templateActions.js
            }
        default:
            return state
    }
}

export default sampleReducer
